data.name: iVRy for SteamVR (Android/Daydream App Installer)
data.detailed_description:
SteamVR

To use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR, you MUST first install SteamVR from the Steam Store.


Before you start

IMPORTANT:

Before using the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for the first time, the Android/Daydream app MUST be installed on the Mobile Device. To do so, enable USB Debugging on the device, connect it via a USB cable to the PC and select the "Install Mobile App" Launch option.

When using the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for the first time, it MUST be started from the "Launch" button, to ensure any additional services and drivers it requires get installed.


About the Game

What is the iVRy for SteamVR (Android/Daydream App Installer) DLC?


• It is the installer for the iVRy app for Android/Daydream Mobile Devices. It will install the Google Play version of the iVRy app, if, for whatever reason, it is not possible to install it via Google Play.

What is iVRy (Android/Daydream Edition)?


• iVRy is an app for your Android device or Daydream headset with a Virtual Reality headset driver for SteamVR.

What does that mean?


• Want to play PC VR* (Virtual Reality) titles without having to buy another VR headset?
• With iVRy and an Android Mobile Device or Daydream headset you can!
• Supports Wired (USB) connections for greater visual quality and performance.
• Supports Wireless (Wifi) connections for greater mobility.
• Automatically adjusts quality to maintain optimal frame rates on all connection types.
• User configurable quality and performance options.
• Integrates with SteamVR, so no 'manager' / 'server' apps or additional configuration required.
• Includes SteamVR Dashboard overlay, to change driver settings in VR.
• Built-in support for NoloVR 6DOF tracking and motion controllers.
• Compatible with most HTC Vive and Oculus Rift** titles.
• "Lite" edition has all of the features of "Premium" edition, but will start to reduce color saturation after being connected for more than 5 minutes. Upgrade to "Premium" edition via Steam DLC to remove this limitation.

* Valve OpenVR/SteamVR. Requires Valve Steam & SteamVR on Windows 7 or later.
** Oculus Rift titles require Valve SteamVR, Oculus Home & 3rd party 'LibreVR Revive' software.

data.short_description: Use your Android Mobile Device or Daydream Mobile headset as a VR Headset for your PC. Lets you run SteamVR & Oculus Rift PC VR titles using your PSVR headset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
